title: Bank of Canada Sees Senior Departures As Carney Pushes Budget Cuts
description: Two longtime directors at the Bank of Canada are retiring as Prime Minister Mark Carney pushes to shrink the public service.
content: Two longtime directors at the Bank of Canada are retiring as Prime Minister Mark Carney pushes to shrink the public service.
